library("venn")

sidebarLayout(
  sidebarPanel(
  numericInput("sets", "Sets", value = 1,min = 1,max = 7),
  textInput(inputId = "notation",label = "Insert Notation",value = "A")
),
  mainPanel(
  plotOutput("vennPlot",height = "500px",width = "500px")
  )

)

  ## Render the Venn diagram plot
output$vennPlot <- renderPlot({
    ## Create a Venn diagram
     x <- input$notation
     # lx <- unlist(strsplit(x,split = "+"))
     # if(any(lx=="+")){
     # lx[which(lx=="+")] <- " \\cup "
     # set.case <- paste("\\( ", paste(lx,collapse =""),"\\)")
     # withMathJax(
     #   helpText(paste("$$", paste(lx,collapse =""),"$$"))
     #   )
     # }
    nsets <- max(1,input$sets)
    venn(input$notation, snames = LETTERS[1:nsets],sncs = 2)
  })
